Translations.Text: Those disbelieved among des popol de scripture tro as idol worshipers insist their voj proof don them
messenger el DI reciting them sankt instrukci
En them tie est valuable teachings
En fakt, those ricev scripture ne disput proof don them
All pet de them est worship DI devoting religi absolutely Him sol observ kontakt prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat)! Such est perfekt religi
Those disbelieved among des popol de scripture idol worshipers incurred fajr Gehenna forever Ili est mav creatures
Those kred plumb righteous life est bon creatures
Their rekompenc their Lord est gxarden Eden flu streams wherein ili abide forever DI PLACX them ILI PLACX Him! Such est rekompenc those reverence their Lord
